triples.name: Network science
triples.relevance: The paper studies higher-order networks as an extension of the foundational network science framework.

triples.name: Complex system
triples.relevance: The paper applies network science to understand complex systems through higher-order network structures.

triples.name: Synchronization
triples.relevance: Synchronization phenomena on higher-order networks is one of the key dynamical processes reviewed in the paper.

triples.name: Contagion
triples.relevance: Contagion processes on higher-order networks is a major dynamical process studied in the survey.

triples.name: Cooperation (evolution)
triples.relevance: The evolution of cooperation is examined as a dynamical process that occurs on higher-order networks.

triples.name: Consensus
triples.relevance: Consensus formation on higher-order networks is a key dynamical process covered in the review.
